chunk_text: The Commission, therefore, proposes to mobilise an amount of EUR 1 164 930. (5) The EGF should, therefore, be mobilised in order to provide a financial contribution for the application submitted by Italy, HAVE ADOPTED THIS DECISION: Article 1 For the general budget of the European Union for the financial year 2013, the European Globalisation Adjustment Fund shall be mobilised to provide the sum of EUR 1 164 930 in commitment and payment appropriations. Article 2 This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Union. Done at Strasbourg, 9 October 2013. For the European Parliament The President M.
